snippet: Kristin Chenoweth, the Tony Award-winning actress and singer, was injured on Wednesday by falling scaffolding on the set of the series “The Good Wife.”
lead_paragraph: Kristin Chenoweth, the Tony Award-winning actress and singer, was injured on Wednesday by falling scaffolding on the set of the series “The Good Wife.”

headline.seo: Kristin Chenoweth Injured on Brooklyn Set of ‘The Good Wife’
headline.main: Chenoweth Is Injured on Set of TV Series
headline.print_headline: Actress Chenoweth Is Injured on Brooklyn Television Set
